      static int MAX_LENGTH_FIELD_TO_TRUST

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(BencodableByteString s)
        Orders objects, which is necessary so that objects of this class can be assured to appear lexicographically in the bencoding of dictionaries.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<BencodableByteString>
        Parameters:
        s - the object to be compared.
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:

        Returns:
